price: Деди: «Сизлар ҳам, ота-боболарингиз ҳам очиқ залолатда бўлгансизлар».
arabic: قَالَ لَقَدۡ كُنتُمۡ أَنتُمۡ وَءَابَآؤُكُمۡ فِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٖ

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qāla laqad kuntum antum waābāukum fī ḍalālin mubīnin
